name: On The Edge
Lore: 'Luke and Leia nearly fell over the retracted bridge across the Death Star''s central core while trying to elude stormtroopers. They were soon trapped on the precipice.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force and target one Rebel (on table) of ability > 2. Choose a number from 1 to 6. You may retrieve that amount from your Lost Pile if you now draw destiny > chosen number. If you fail, Rebel is lost.',
